title: Flat Screen TVs, Special Corporate & Group Rate Housing, Free Parking
posting_body: ['Looking for a great extended stay apartment in Memphis?', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-No Long-Term Lease Required', '-Free Utilities', '-Fully Furnished', '-Free Premium Cable TV', '-Nearby Restaurants, Shopping, Entertainment & More', '-High Speed WiFi Available', '-Housekeeping & Linen Services Available', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Full Kitchenette with Large Refrigerator', '-Flat Screen TVs', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.', "PROPERTY CURRENTLY UNDERGOING RENOVATIONS WITH NEW RATES & NEW STUDIO'S. PLEASE BE ADVISED", "THE NEW STUDIO'S REFLECT NEW RATES AT THIS TIME.", 'PLEASE CALL OR STOP BY.', 'OPEN MONDAY-FRIDAY 9:00AM-7:00PM', 'CST MONDAY-FRIDAY', '11:00AM-7:00PM SATURDAY', 'CLOSED ON SUNDAY', "WE HAVE NEW STUDIO'S AND NEW RATES NOW.", 'PLEASE CALL OR STOP BY.', 'WE WELCOME YOU.', "NEW QUEEN SIZE BED'S,MICROWAVES,FULL REFRIGERATOR,40' INCH TELEVISION,UTILITIES,WIFI,SECURITY, ON SITE LAUNDRY ROOM.", "NEW QUEEN STUDIO- 273.03 PLUS TAX & FEE'S APPLY.", '(WEEKLY)', "NEW XL STUDIO-296.68 PLUS TAX & FEE'S (WEEKLY)", "NEW 2 BED STUDIO 296.68 PLUS TAX AND FEE'S(WEEKLY)", 'PLEASE CALL OR STOP BY.....WE ARE READY TO MOVE YOU IN ASAP.']
